extendedInfo.description: There is no cost for this mobile app, but it requires a working trial, or paid subscription of Intuit Field Service Management.  To log in use the same company name you see on your Person Profile in Field Service Management.  Contact support if you have questions.The features in this app include:* View Manage "Active Work Orders"* Process Work Orders* Process Service Agreement Work Orders (part of an optional module)* Add and View Time Card Records (part of an optional module)* View Work Order Details* Accept Signature on Work Order* Email Work Order* View and Edit Custom Fields* Configure Work Order Lists* Configure Work Order Details page* Error Reporting/Send Log* Receive Work Order Alerts* View and Add Text Notes* View Picture Notes* Attach Picture Notes from Device Albums* Attach Photos from the Device Camera* View Equipment Service History* View and Edit Equipment Attributes* Add Equipment to Site through Work Order* Change Equipment on Work Order* See Work Orders Where I am Secondary* Send GPS Location from the Field* Price Up Invoice from the Field* Email Invoice* Take payment in the field though (additional fees apply)* Email Receipt* View and Manage Received Alerts* Configure Mobile App through Settings* Create work orders* Re-assign work ordersThis application is NOT compatible with CorrigoNet or WorkTrack Facilities Management.

reviews.title: I love this!
reviews.comment: Allows me to process work orders, check job status, dispatch calls, etc. from outside the office!
reviews.author: Lesley Pope

reviews.title: Great but needs a few tweeks
reviews.comment: Please give us the access to adding customer locations as well as individual customers!!! Thank you and keep up the good work
reviews.author: Jason Fuerstenberg

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: It has been great having our field techs able to receive the work orders and complete there tickets without us having to enter them in the computer system. Once you learn the all features it work pretty well.
reviews.author: Nick Scarnecchia

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: even worse after last update. crashes constantly will not let you sign on is the worst crap ive ever used.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Convenient, but needs more options
reviews.comment: Needs options under different categories, like I need option to select \"todays\" in category  \"waiting for pickup\" so I don\'t have to view all waiting to pick up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs to be updated
reviews.comment: I started using this app with a Blackberry and I really liked the features that came with but hated the network and the platform I was using it on. I started using it on Android and was really hoping it would have the same features, i.e. ability to create a work order, search work orders, reassign work orders, customer history, etc.. however was extremely disappointed that it has yet to be updated to include these features. Until they do an update, I will be looking up another similar system that will have everything and will be a lot cheaper.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: Freezes constantly! Have to delete and redownload!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Work orders ...
reviews.comment: Needs to have the ability to create a new work order... or i jus havnt figured it out yet... lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Too many bugs and missing a lot of functionality.  Need the ability to print an invoice or at least generate a PDF.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Love this app. Works well for techs in the field.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: App constantly locks up, drains battery with no option to kill gps tracking.   Highly considering changing our business operations system based off how much time this waste with intuit.
reviews.author: David Hall
